name: Jets
short_description: Jets is a set of Maple procedures to facilitate solution of differential equations in total derivatives on diffieties. It computes symmetries, conservation laws, zero-curvature representations, recursion operators and other invariants of systems of PDEs.

license.fullpath: License :: OSI-Approved Open Source :: GNU General Public License version 2.0 (GPLv2)
